ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
12 jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise, seeds and membranes removed

cookingTips: Mix cream cheese and cheddar together until well combined before filling peppers
Wrap bacon tightly around each popper half to prevent it from unraveling during cooking
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until bacon is crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the cheese mixture consistency and proper bacon wrapping technique for even cooking.
